com.tommyhasselman.termsconditions.model

Class OrderItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tommyhasselman.termsconditions.model.OrderItem
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Item

    public abstract class OrderItem
extends java.lang.Object
    Order Item is the abstract class that defines values for use in the Item class.

    • Field Detail

      • plainProductBoundary

        protected int plainProductBoundary
        The index boundary where the flavoured products begin.

      • productTypes

        protected java.lang.String[] productTypes
        The String array of product types. All plain types are at the beginning of the array, followed by flavoured types.

      • drawables

        protected int[] drawables
        The int array of drawable resource values, which line up with the corresponding product types.

      • labbelledDrawables

        protected int[] labbelledDrawables
        The int array of drawable resource values, which line up with the corresponding product types. These drawables have labels.

      • sizes

        protected java.lang.String[] sizes
        String array of size values.

      • intSizes

        protected int[] intSizes
        int array of size values.

      • colours

        protected java.lang.String[] colours
        String array of colours.

      • argbColours

        protected int[] argbColours
        int array of aRGB values.

    • Method Detail

      • getCode

        public abstract java.lang.String getCode()
        Returns:
        Returns the unique identifying code for this item.

      • getArgbColour

        public abstract int getArgbColour()
        Returns:
        Returns the aRGB int value for this item.

      • getIntSize

        public abstract int getIntSize()
        Returns:
        Returns the int size value for this item.

      • getDrawable

        public abstract int getDrawable()
        Returns:
        Returns the resource int value for the drawable of this item.
